```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("train.csv")
df$Sex <- factor(df$Sex)
df$Pclass <- factor(df$Pclass)
glm.fits <- glm(
  Survived ~ Sex + Pclass+Age, 
  family = binomial,
  data=df
)

summary(glm.fits)

```
